IS590DV - Data Viz

This is the course website for IS590DV in Spring 2020

  • View On GitHub

Week 3 - Types of Viz and Choosing Colors

This week, we covered how colors work, how transformations work, and how we can choose colors and transforms to better suit our data.

We also did some basics of Pandas.
